channel.title: 🏢 Polytechnique Montreal on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Polytechnique Montreal on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DistrictNet: Decision-aware learning for geographical districting
item.description: DISTRICTNET: A novel decision-aware learning approach drastically cuts geographical districting costs by integrating combinatorial optimization and graph neural networks.
